name: Peter Mason
pob: North Carolina (records also suggest locations in Georgia or Virginia, but North Carolina is most frequently cited for his birth).
pod: Conecuh County, Alabama (in what is now Escambia County)
bio:
Peter Mason was the patriarch of a large family that helped settle the Conecuh and Covington County areas.

Records identify his father as Thomas Mason (born approx. 1722) and his mother as Elisabeth (born approx. 1733).
